abstract: The $662 million buyout bid for Pactera Technology International, an outsourcing firm, is the latest in a series of deals by private equity groups to privatize Chinese firms listed in the United States.
snippet: The $662 million buyout bid for Pactera Technology International, an outsourcing firm, is the latest in a series of deals by private equity groups to privatize Chinese firms listed in the United States.
lead_paragraph: A fund run by the Blackstone Group is leading a $662.3 million bid for a technology outsourcing firm based in China, the latest example of a modest boom among buyout shops backing the privatization of Chinese companies listed in the United States.

headline.main: Blackstone Leads Latest Chinese Privatization Bid
